summary: This document appears to be a financial record or invoice listing for water treatment and cooling tower maintenance services performed at a property referred to as 'Epstein Tower' or 'Epstein' between 2016 and 2018. It details monthly and quarterly maintenance, cleaning, disinfection, and Legionella testing.

events.title: Epstein Tower Cooling Tower Cleaning
events.description: Cleaning and disinfection service performed on the cooling tower at Epstein Tower.

events.title: Legionella Test at Cooling Tower
events.description: Legionella testing and 90-day tower inspection performed.

keyFacts: The document lists recurring water treatment and cooling tower maintenance services for a property called 'Epstein Tower'.
Services include monthly maintenance, cleaning, disinfection, and specific testing for Legionella bacteria.
The service records span from at least April 2016 through December 2018.
The document is formatted as a financial or work order record with client codes, dates, and service descriptions.
